I think you have to use the [TickTack](http://ticktack.im/index.htm) client, but I've never used it. If you want to get a bit hacky you can:

1. Attach a Markdown file to a post.
2. Save the blob ID somewhere.
3. Post it manually with `ssb-server`:

```sh
ssb-server publish \
  --type 'blog' \
  --title 'Your title here' \
  --summary 'Some short summary' \
  --blog "&blobidthatyousavedearliershouldgohere=.sha256'
```
